page.title: 05Recreation and Leisure
page.content: THE TOWN HAS A STRONG SPORTING TRADITION. A SPLENDID RECREATION CENTRE & A NEW LEISURE POOL ARE AMONGST THE MANY FACILITIES. TUDHOE & SPENNYMOOR CRICKET CLUBS EXIST AT OPPOSITE ENDS OF THE TOWN. SPENNYMOOR UNITED F.C. BASED AT THE BREWERY FIELD HAS ENJOYED A HIGH REPUTATION OVER THE PAST 80 YEARS. VICTORIA JUBILEE PARK OFFERS BOWLING GREENS & TENNIS COURTS & A POPULAR INDOOR BOWLS AREA IS CLOSE TO WHITWORTH TERRACE. THERE IS A DOG TRACK IN MERRINGTON LANE. THE TOWN'S SUCCESSFUL AMATEUR OPERATIC GROUP PERFORMS REGULARLY AT THE TOWNHALL & THERE IS NOW A JUNIOR GROUP. THE TOWN BAND HAS JUST ENDED A RECORD BREAKING SEASON IN COMPETITIONS & AN ACTIVE DRAMA GROUP IS BASED AT THE SETTLEMENT THEATRE. SPENNYMOOR BOASTS A NUMBER OF WOMEN'S INSTITUTES AS WELL AS SEVERAL SOCIAL & WORKINGMEN'S CLUBS.
